Yes, the critical part says: IF 'run_agent' returns "not_found" AND "Status: More items available", you must call run_agent again with the same cursorName. Do not stop. Repeat until found or status is cursor_complete.

In the last response, the decision was "continue", no new evidence, status more items available. So I need to run the agent again. Let's do that.
